<span class="citation" data-cites="emotion/react">@emotion/react</span>
=======================================================================

> Simple styling in React.

Install
-------

    yarn add @emotion/react

Usage
-----

    /** @jsx jsx */
    import { jsx, css, Global, ClassNames } from '@emotion/react'

    render(
      <div css={{ color: 'hotpink' }}>
        <div
          css={css`
            color: green;
          `}
        />
        <Global
          styles={{
            body: {
              margin: 0,
              padding: 0
            }
          }}
        />
        <ClassNames>
          {({ css, cx }) => (
            <div
              className={cx(
                'some-class',
                css`
                  color: yellow;
                `
              )}
            />
          )}
        </ClassNames>
      </div>
    )

More documentation is available at https://emotion.sh.
